spec.name: Slicer
spec.subtitle: Making the Data Flow
spec.description: For the Slicer, a computer or datapad is just a puzzle to solve with prizes for doing so. "Slicing" is the term used for the invasive efforts to steal or alter data in a system. With practically the entire galaxy wired to computerized systems, Slicers are extremely valuable people ot know, and dangerous to cross.
